example: They're launching(= starting) an appeal to raise money for famine victims.
What time will your train arrive?
It is hoped that a compromise will be reached in today's talks.
There were one or two familiar faces(= people I knew).
The majority of the employees have university degrees.

meaning: (v) trộn lẫn, pha lẫn, (n) sự kết hợp, hỗn hợp
example: Oil and water don't mix. Even if you shake them together they separate into two layers.
[ + -ing verb ] The success of this project relies on everyone making an effort.
That ladder doesn't look very secure to me.
I think my husband is the most handsome man in the world, but I realize my judgment is rather subjective.
I don't know what to wear tonight - do you have any suggestions?
